name: weavejs
description: Collection of visualization tools and UI for the WeaveJS project.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:as && npm run clean:ts
scripts.compile-weavejs: npm run compile-as && npm run compile-astypings && npm run compile-ts && npm run compile-libs && mkdirp lib && node run-ts build
scripts.compile: npm run compile-weavejs && cd WeaveApp && npm run compile
scripts.compile-refs: node run-ts main-import-tool -d WeaveTSJS/src/weavejs -f WeaveTSJS/src/_references.ts && npm run compile-librefs
scripts.compile-libs: npm run compile-librefs && tsc -p ./WeaveTSJS/tsconfig-libs.json && node scripts/babel-with-source-maps.js -i WeaveTSJS/bin/es6/libs.js -m WeaveTSJS/bin/es6/libs.js.map -o WeaveTSJS/bin/js/libs.js
scripts.compile-ts: npm run compile-refs && tsc -p ./WeaveTSJS/tsconfig.json && mkdirp ./WeaveTSJS/bin/js && node scripts/babel-with-source-maps.js -i WeaveTSJS/bin/es6/weavejs.js -m WeaveTSJS/bin/es6/weavejs.js.map -o WeaveTSJS/bin/js/weavejs.js && cp ./WeaveTSJS/bin/es6/weavejs.d.ts ./weave-typings/
scripts.compile-astypings: as2dts --defs-only ./WeaveASJS/src ./WeaveASJS/typings/src && tsc -d -p ./WeaveASJS/typings/ && cp WeaveASJS/typings/weavejs-core.d.ts ./weave-typings && mv WeaveASJS/typings/*.d.ts ./WeaveTSJS/typings/weave

author: WeaveTeam <devteam@iweave.com>
